### Angel, Domini

_Winged, flawless humans glowing with bronze sunlight._

**LV** 9, **AL** L
**AC** 17, **HP** 42, **MV** near (fly)
**ATK** 3 bastard sword +7 (1d8) or 1 horn

|  S  |  D  |  C  |  I  |  W  |  Ch  |
|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:----:|
| 4 | 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 4 |

**Horn:** All enemies in near DC 15 CHA or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.
